Loading.description: Loading message, displayed when starting up

activateChromecastBetaDescription.message: Video Player can now play your videos on your TV using Chromecast media streaming device.

activateChromecastBetaOffer.message: This feature is offered free for limited time.

activateChromecastBetaSupport.message: While player is in Chrome tab, navigate to the Settings menu in the upper right corner of your browser and click Cast...

activateChromecastBetaTerms.message: Subject to Beta testing program. Limited time offer. Feature may later be offered separately as a paid service.

appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.
appDesc.message: Video-Player mit Playlist und Galerie. Unterstützt Chromecast!

appDesc2.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.
appDesc2.message: Sehen Sie Ihre lokale Video Dateien auf TV und benutzen Maus als Fernbedienung.

appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appName2.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

betaFinishedDescription.message: Your Chromecast mode Beta activation is finished. Please update Video Player app to get the most recent release!

betaProlongationDescription.description: Good news! We decided to extend the free beta program for the Chromecast mode. You can now activate and use it free for 3 more month.
betaProlongationDescription.message: Good news! We decided to extend the free beta program for the Chromecast mode. You can now use it free for 3 more month.

betaProlongationFeedback.description: We are not yet sure whether to keep Chromecast mode in future. Tell us if you like it here
betaProlongationFeedback.message: We are not yet sure whether to keep Chromecast mode in future. Tell us if you like it

chromecastIssuesDescription.message: If you experience slow response on your TV or playback is not smooth, go to Google Cast extension options and change casting quality to Standard (480p).

foldersDialogDescription.message: 'Video Player' will read video files from locations selected below:

foldersDialogGDriveButton.description: Folders dialog: add google drive folder button

foldersDialogLocalButton.description: Folders dialog: add local folder button

foldersDialogThumbnailsCheckbox.message: Generate thumbnails for new Google Drive videos (consumes internet traffic)

foldersDialogTitlesCheckbox.description: Show title at the beginning of each video
foldersDialogTitlesCheckbox.message: Show title at the beginning of each video

noVideos.description: No videos callout, displayed if gallery is empty
noVideos.message: Press this button to add videos

noticeChromecast.description: Press this button to toggle Chromecast mode
noticeChromecast.message: Press this button to toggle Chromecast mode

ourTeam.message: We are constantly improving our software. If you want to get quick fix, click

passwordReset.description: Reinstall Video Player to reset password

playbackIssuesDescription.message: Some files might have issues with video or sound because your Google Chrome does not support many codecs yet. It is not of our power to fix that. Convert your videos to WEBM format to have 100% compatibility with Chrome.
